## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G27540](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G27540)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>emb2473, MIRO1</u>
- **Gene Name:** embryo defective 2473, MIRO-related GTP-ase 1
- **Description:**   MIRO-related GTP-ase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2146385
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Gene Ontology:

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [miro1-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Embryo lethal. Embryos arrest between zygote and four cell stage. Abnormal male transmission due to defects in pollen germination and pollen tube growth. Abnormal mitochondrial morphology.
